title: Set app title to YONO DAN

requirements.summary: Set the app title to 'YONO DAN' in the HTML entry point
acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab shows 'YONO DAN' when the app is open
The <title> tag in frontend/index.html reads 'YONO DAN'

file_operations.description: Update the <title> tag in the <head> section from the current title to 'YONO DAN' so the browser tab displays the new app name.

requirements.summary: Update the app name/branding displayed in the app header and login screens to 'YONO DAN'
acceptanceCriteria: App header or logo area shows 'YONO DAN' as the app name
Login/signup screen reflects the 'YONO DAN' branding

file_operations.description: Update any app name or branding text in the Header component to display 'YONO DAN' as the app title or logo text.
Update the app name or branding text in the LoginSignup component to show 'YONO DAN', ensuring the login and signup screens reflect the new app branding.
